zimlet.name: tk_barrydegraaff_zbug1005
zimlet.label: Bugfix ZBUG-1005
zimlet.description: Incoming appointment requests via mailview are not applied to the calendar that is listed as default instead the appointments are added to the primary Calendar, since 8.8.11. See https://github.com/Zimbra/zm-web-client/commit/c170de15380e5bf820cfe6341d32e625664cd8c0#diff-8cd4bb295cdcc2bf53e92ae8ae98827dR1372
